impactDescription:
-Collected  more than 350 music NFTs, mostly on OP, backed 40 artists, introduced music NFTs directly to more than 30 people , more than 10 of them made confirmed collecting actions ,strongly supported to these names : Rohki , Danial Allan, Sadye, TK,weghost... 
-Educated people around about opportunities on OP ecosystem, focus on music NFTs, lowest-fastest layer 2, optimized layer as its name. Some of them are dev (from level finance) and freelance coder who had more than 5 yrs in crypto . Promoted KOLs who writing reviews about music NFT products on Sound.xyz (@nhagio_o, @hanpro20,@SolitaryVegeta)
contributionDescription:
-Be a part of Camel community, we promoted collecting  music NFTs on Optimism chain, bringing more revenue directly to artists, no third parties included, promote artists to creates more and more products . Beside, this action could attract more traditional artist and their fans to join web3, specially  using OP layer to optimize cost for both them and their followers
-Raising web2 people's awareness about opportunities on OP ecosystem through twitter, telegram and discord; focusing on music NFTs, lowest-fastest layer 2, optimized layer as its name
-Active user on OP, using dapp such as Uniswap, stargate , multichain, sushiswap, 1inch, mint fun
